title: Create Well Drilling Plan
description: A drilling engineer designs a well plan for a new offshore exploration well, including casing design and trajectory.

tasks.description: Using offset well data, determine the required casing points and design the casing strings.
tasks.expected_outcome: A safe and compliant casing design is generated.

tasks.description: Plan the optimal well trajectory to intersect multiple reservoir targets while avoiding hazards.
tasks.expected_outcome: An efficient and safe well path is designed.

tasks.description: Generate the final drilling program document, including all operational steps and risk assessments.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete and approved drilling program is ready for operations.
